channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPress InviteBox Plugin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPress InviteBox Plugin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38359|2024-08-04T01:37:16.686Z -- wordpress%20invitebox%20plugin -- wordpress%20invitebox%20plugin
item.description: The WordPress InviteBox Plugin for viral Refer-a-Friend Promotions WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the message parameter found in the ~/admin/admin.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.4.1.
